title: KIM SWITCH / PORTRAIT REACTION
description: The conversation you and Kim are gonna have the first time he sees you with your new and powerful visage, Icebreaker.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened to you?" the lieuten..."
dialogueTree.text: "What happened to you?" the lieutenant asks as he leans in, eyes mapping your frozen face.

links.title: Suggestion: "Better keep the lieutenant in the d..."
links.text: Better keep the lieutenant in the dark about the whole 'Icebreaker' thing. He's not gonna get it.

links.title: You: ""What do you mean, lieutenant?""
links.text: "What do you mean, lieutenant?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You look... different. Constipated..."
links.text: "You look... different. Constipated somehow?"

links.title: You: ""Oh, this?" (Point to your face.)"
links.text: "Oh, this?" (Point to your face.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, your face." He nods, looking..."
links.text: "Yes, your face." He nods, looking worried. "Looks like you're having a stroke. Can you even move it?"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "That's a negative, lieutenant."
links.text: That's a negative, lieutenant.

links.title: You: ""Absolutely." (Lift the corners of..."
links.text: "Absolutely." (Lift the corners of your mouth with index fingers.) "See?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I just don't understand, officer."..."
links.text: "I just don't understand, officer." The lieutenant just stands there, looking perplexed. "Please, help me understand."

links.title: You: ""I don't need to 'move it', this is..."
links.text: "I don't need to 'move it', this is my final form."

links.title: You: ""I'm fine, don't worry about it.""
links.text: "I'm fine, don't worry about it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You don't look fine and I'm *very*..."
links.text: "You don't look fine and I'm *very* worried about it." He crosses his arms on his chest.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Should I contact his station's laza..."
links.text: Should I contact his station's lazareth? Behind his back?

links.title: You: ""This is what I am now, Kim. What I..."
links.text: "This is what I am now, Kim. What I was always meant to be."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And what is that? A walking mask?""
links.text: "And what is that? A walking mask?"

links.title: You: ""I am Icebreaker.""
links.text: "I am Icebreaker."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, you are not. What you are is a..."
links.text: "No, you are not. What you are is an RCM lieutenant conducting a murder investigation."

links.title: You: ""I plough my way towards the frigid..."
links.text: "I plough my way towards the frigid lands of Katla and Vaasa, smashing every ice sheet in my path..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, but you see, you don't," the l..."
links.text: "No, but you see, you don't," the lieutenant explains patiently, although his voice is suddenly very tired. "You're not an icebreaker or a firewalker, or even Tequila Sunset."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, but you see, you don't," the l..."
links.text: "No, but you see, you don't," the lieutenant explains patiently, although his voice is suddenly very tired. "You're not an icebreaker or a firewalker, or even RaphaÃ«l Ambrosius Costeau."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, but you see, you *don't*," the..."
links.text: "No, but you see, you *don't*," the lieutenant explains patiently, although his voice is very tired suddenly. "You're not a firewalker, you're not an icebreaker."

links.title: You: ""Nothing, *nothing* can stop the Ic..."
links.text: "Nothing, *nothing* can stop the Icebreaker..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you fucking insane?!" the lieu..."
links.text: "Are you fucking insane?!" the lieutenant snaps at you. "Don't answer that! And STOP doing it! Let's go."

links.title: Authority: "The lieutenant's command instantly..."
links.text: The lieutenant's command instantly lets all the wind out of your sails, like he overrode your mind or flicked some secret master-switch.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Suddenly the whole Icebreaker conce..."
links.text: Suddenly the whole Icebreaker concept seems... just lame.

links.title: Volition: "It's like he re-conditioned your br..."
links.text: It's like he re-conditioned your brain.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry, Kim, I don't know what..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, Kim, I don't know what came over me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's okay," he says quietly. "We'r..."
links.text: "It's okay," he says quietly. "We're both under a lot of stress right now. Let's just try to not let it get to us and remember what we came here to do."

links.title: You: ""It is a powerful metaphor, lieuten..."
links.text: "It is a powerful metaphor, lieutenant. For my resolve."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, that's all right." He looks..."
links.text: "Okay, that's all right." He looks visibly relieved. "As long as you understand it is a metaphor and don't build a persona around it."

links.title: You: ""They say you can hear the ice crac..."
links.text: "They say you can hear the ice crack from a..."

links.title: You: ""I understand. It's not gonna becom..."
links.text: "I understand. It's not gonna become a thing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, good." The lieutenant's postur..."
links.text: "Oh, good." The lieutenant's posture relaxes. "Thank you! And sorry I asked about it. It's none of my business. Let's just get back to work."

links.title: You: ""I understand *nothing*.""
links.text: "I understand *nothing*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, but you see, you don't," the l..."
links.text: "No, but you see, you don't," the lieutenant explains patiently, but his voice is very tired. "You are not Tequila Sunset and you are not an icebreaker. Stop, please!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, but you see, you don't," the l..."
links.text: "No, but you see, you don't," the lieutenant explains patiently, but his voice is very tired. "You're not RaphaÃ«l Ambrosius Costeau and you're not an icebreaker!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, but you see, you don't," the l..."
links.text: "No, but you see, you don't," the lieutenant explains patiently, but his voice is very tired. "You're not an icebreaker, Harry. Please stop."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, but you see, you don't," the l..."
links.text: "No, but you see, you don't," the lieutenant explains patiently, but his voice is very tired. "Your name is Harrier Du Bois, not 'Icebreaker'."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, but you see, you don't," the l..."
links.text: "No, but you see, you don't," the lieutenant explains patiently, his voice suddenly tired. "You don't plough anything, you help me solve this case, please remember."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, you are not. What you are is a..."
links.text: "No, you are not. What you are is an officer of the Revachol Citizens Militia conducting a murder investigation."

links.title: You: ""A noble sufferer.""
links.text: "A noble sufferer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think *you* are supposed t..."
links.text: "I don't think *you* are supposed to call yourself that." A fleeting smile crosses his lips. "But I appreciate the honesty. Now let's get back to work."

links.title: You: ""He Who Stares Straight into the Ec..."
links.text: "He Who Stares Straight into the Eclipse."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So now you want to go blind as wel..."
links.text: "So now you want to go blind as well?" He shakes his head. "How about we become Those Who Solve Murder Cases instead and get back to work?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "Neither was an actual question."
links.text: Neither was an actual question.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "The lieutenant is *not* loving the..."
links.text: The lieutenant is *not* loving the new look.

links.title: You: ""He Who Withstands All Temptation.""
links.text: "He Who Withstands All Temptation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Including drinking?""
links.text: "Including drinking?"

links.title: You: ""Including drinking.""
links.text: "Including drinking."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hm." The lieutenant seems almost i..."
links.text: "Hm." The lieutenant seems almost impressed. "Admitting a problem is the first step forward. Perhaps now we can finally get some work done."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Shall we?" He looks ready to go."
links.text: "Shall we?" He looks ready to go.

links.title: You: ""Excluding drinking.""
links.text: "Excluding drinking."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What temptations is *He* withstand..."
links.text: "What temptations is *He* withstanding then?" asks the lieutenant with a puzzled look.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know what? I don't even want t..."
links.text: "You know what? I don't even want to know. Let it be one of your *internal* side-cases. I just want to get back to work."

links.title: You: ""Excluding drinking. And drugs.""
links.text: "Excluding drinking. And drugs."

links.title: You: ""The last kingsman.""
links.text: "The last kingsman."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The last kingsman..." he repeats p..."
links.text: "The last kingsman..." he repeats pensively, inspecting your face. "That's fitting, I suppose. Almost as if you *did* manage to turn back time. If only for yourself."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Face of a millipede trapped in ambe..."
links.text: Face of a millipede trapped in amber...

links.title: Inland Empire: "But somehow it doesn't scare him, l..."
links.text: But somehow it doesn't scare him, like it scared you. Doesn't make him quiver with cold. Poor guy...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright, detective," he reaches ou..."
links.text: "Alright, detective," he reaches out and pats you on the arm. It feels strangely encouraging. "Let's get going, we've got a killer to catch."

links.title: You: ""There's nothing more to talk about..."
links.text: "There's nothing more to talk about, only to *endure*." [Leave.]
